title: Yosemite National Park: Trailhead Parking
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Hiking     Yosemite Valley     Trailhead Parking                  Yosemite Valley Trailhead Parking          Â       Overnight parking is available at Half Dome Village (formerly Curry Village) and at Trailhead Parking southeast of Half Dome Village. Sleeping in vehicles is not permitted. Food lockers are available at both locations. If there is any chance you will return after dark, you should store your food in these lockers.
